statements: SELECT * FROM device_credentials WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, username FROM device_credentials WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_credentials WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_credentials WHERE device_name LIKE '%sensor%' AND password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, username FROM device_credentials WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_credentials WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT device_name, username FROM device_credentials WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, username FROM device_credentials WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'password123'
SELECT * FROM device_credentials ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT device_id, device_name, password FROM device_credentials WHERE device_name LIKE '%sensor%'
SELECT * FROM DeviceUsers;
SELECT username, user_id FROM DeviceUsers ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, access_level FROM DeviceAccess WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM DeviceAccess ORDER BY user_id DESC, device_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM DeviceUsers WHERE username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceUsers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM DeviceUsers WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT device_id, user_id, access_level FROM DeviceAccess WHERE device_id = 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, access_level FROM DeviceUsers JOIN DeviceAccess ON DeviceUsers.user_id = DeviceAccess.user_id WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM DeviceUsers WHERE username LIKE '%example%' AND password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM device_credentials;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_credentials WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM device_credentials WHERE device_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT device_id, login_time, logout_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, username, password FROM device_credentials WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_credentials WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE device_id = 2 AND login_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT device_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM device_credentials LEFT JOIN security_events ON device_credentials.device_id = security_events.device_id GROUP BY device_id, device_name ORDER BY total_events DESC, device_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, authentication_key FROM device_credentials WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash, salt FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT log_id, device_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_log ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_log ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_credentials WHERE device_type = 'mobile' AND device_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT admin_name, admin_role FROM admin_credentials WHERE admin_role = 'super_admin' AND admin_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM device_credentials;
SELECT device_id, username FROM device_credentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT role_name AS role, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id > 3;
SELECT device_id, access_type, access_timestamp FROM device_access WHERE access_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM device_credentials WHERE device_id = '12345';
SELECT username, password FROM device_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT d.device_id, d.username, l.log_timestamp FROM device_credentials d JOIN device_logs l ON d.device_id = l.device_id;
SELECT ar.role_id, ar.role_name, da.access_type FROM user_roles ar JOIN device_access da ON ar.role_id = da.access_id;
SELECT al.log_id, al.access_timestamp, al.access_result FROM access_logs al JOIN device_access da ON al.access_id = da.access_id ORDER BY al.access_timestamp DESC;
